text: Grace L. Drake (1926 â€“ 31 December 2020) was an American politician. She was a member of the Ohio Senate from 1984 to 2000. Drake was a member of the Republican Party. She was born in Connecticut. Drake died on 31 December 2020 at the age of 94.Former Ohio Sen.
